description:
Legoshi offers to escort Hal home; on the way she attempts to become better friends with him, unaware of his guilt. Juno has a revelation.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Caught Like Floss in a Canine`s Teeth
Comme un fil entre les crocs
Kenshi ni Ito Youji Hikkakeru You ni
犬歯に糸ようじひっかけるように
